review: Love it! Love it! Love it! I've a TV in a room that is now the 'exercise room' I wanted to be able to watch movies, etc. without moving the Wii over to the TV. Well, this was the answer. It was very easy to put together and I'm using it wireless with my TV. The hardest part was connecting the Amazon Fire TV to my HDMI TV connection. TV is on the wall and I'm vertically challenged so had to call in the spouse for backup.  I actually yelled 'Gary Busey!' when I connected all together! Hee! Hee!
author: chela1260

review: Before i bought this product i thought for sure the reason my movies kept freezing was that the Amazon servers were overloaded. Turns out that i was wrong! I use two Sony blue ray players to stream video.It turns out those blue ray players didn't have enough processing power and ram and that's the reason the movies kept buffering (freezing). The Amazon fire TV is lighting fast and does not have an issue with buffering (freezing)! This is a great product! I guess its time to buy two more for the other rooms. The only thing that would make this better is a small software issue when you use the voice search to search for a movie i wish it would bring up what is in your video library first. for example if i know that Iron man is in your Library and you search for it the movie that is in your library should be one be on of the results.Great product Amazon!!
